# ic-stepper

This is a wrapper component to be placed around one or more ic-step components

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                     | Type                     | Default        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | -------------- |
| `aligned`        | `aligned`         | How the default stepper should be aligned in its container.                                                                                                                                     | `"full-width" \| "left"` | `"full-width"` |
| `connectorWidth` | `connector-width` | The length of the connnector between each step in pixels. Minimum length is 100px.                                                                                                              | `number`                 | `100`          |
| `hideStepInfo`   | `hide-step-info`  | If `true`, step information, i.e. step title, step subtitle and step status, on all default steps will be hidden. Step information will still be visible in the compact variant of the stepper. | `boolean`                | `false`        |
| `variant`        | `variant`         | The variant of the stepper.                                                                                                                                                                     | `"compact" \| "default"` | `"default"`    |


----------------------------------------------
